markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Incredible Mount](/Feats.aspx?ID=6293) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=535" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 193 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetype** [Cavalier](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=244)

**Prerequisites**
[Impressive Mount](/Feats.aspx?ID=6289)

</column>

---

Under your care and training, your mount has realized its innate potential. The mount you gained through the [Cavalier Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=6286) feat becomes a nimble or savage animal companion (your choice), gaining additional capabilities determined by the type of companion.

<title level="2">Incredible Mount leads to...</title>
[Specialized Mount](/Feats.aspx?ID=6296)
name: Incredible Mount
